Step.Name: Warehouse Table - Import Data 1

Step.Definition: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <StorageObject xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <DefKey>44e7b810-6f35-4562-bc9a-3f98cc4ef3dd</DefKey> <InputTableName>RAW_CHART</InputTableName> <Columns> <ColumnItemDef> <DefKey>44659dbc-c9c2-4eed-998b-36680ad04f1b</DefKey> <ColumnName>ChartTypeClassification</ColumnName> <ColumnType>STR</ColumnType> <ColumnAction Description="Calculate">CAL</ColumnAction> <Expression>IIF(Right([ACCNBRI], 13)='&&&&&&&&&&&&&', 'Entity', IIF( Right([ACCNBRI], 3)='&&&' AND Left([ACCNBRI],9)='&&&&&&&&&', 'Account Classification', IIF(Right([ACCNBRI], 4)='&&&&' AND Left([ACCNBRI],6)='&&&&&&','Activity Code', IIF(Right([ACCNBRI], 7)='&&&&&&&','Cost Centre', IIF(Left([ACCNBRI], 9)='&&&&&&&&&','Natural Account', 'Other')))))</Expression> <ColumnToTotal></ColumnToTotal> <ColumnToRestartOnChange></ColumnToRestartOnChange> <DefaultValue></DefaultValue> <LookupName></LookupName> <LookupColumnName></LookupColumnName> </ColumnItemDef> <ColumnItemDef> <DefKey>06c2df91-544b-499d-987b-3de17edd47c0</DefKey> <ColumnName>CostCentre</ColumnName> <ColumnType>STR</ColumnType> <ColumnAction Description="Calculate">CAL</ColumnAction> <Expression>Left([ACCNBRI], 6)</Expression> <ColumnToTotal></ColumnToTotal> <ColumnToRestartOnChange></ColumnToRestartOnChange> <DefaultValue></DefaultValue> <LookupName></LookupName> <LookupColumnName></LookupColumnName> </ColumnItemDef> <ColumnItemDef> <DefKey>a58bac0e-e1f2-4ff6-b1df-f401ca0ac0bc</DefKey> <ColumnName>ActivityCode</ColumnName> <ColumnType>STR</ColumnType> <ColumnAction Description="Calculate">CAL</ColumnAction> <Expression>substr([ACCNBRI], 7,3)</Expression> <ColumnToTotal></ColumnToTotal> <ColumnToRestartOnChange></ColumnToRestartOnChange> <DefaultValue></DefaultValue> <LookupName></LookupName> <LookupColumnName></LookupColumnName> </ColumnItemDef> <ColumnItemDef> <DefKey>59ed6491-4f60-471f-9c1e-7a388b941fe0</DefKey> <ColumnName>NaturalAccount</ColumnName> <ColumnType>STR</ColumnType> <ColumnAction Description="Calculate">CAL</ColumnAction> <Expression>Right([ACCNBRI], 4)</Expression> <ColumnToTotal></ColumnToTotal> <ColumnToRestartOnChange></ColumnToRestartOnChange> <DefaultValue></DefaultValue> <LookupName></LookupName> <LookupColumnName></LookupColumnName> </ColumnItemDef> </Columns> <Lookups /> <AddKeyColumn>false</AddKeyColumn> <KeyColumnName>ChartTypeClassification</KeyColumnName> </StorageObject>

Step.Definition: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <StorageObject xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <DefKey>44e7b810-6f35-4562-bc9a-3f98cc4ef3dd</DefKey> <InputTableName>Distinct_Natural_Accounts_COA</InputTableName> <Columns> <ColumnItemDef> <DefKey>507d3665-b902-400c-b6fd-27bf66299e1a</DefKey> <ColumnName>REPORT_SECTION_NAME</ColumnName> <ColumnType></ColumnType> <ColumnAction Description="Calculate">CAL</ColumnAction> <Expression>IIF(Left([SELN_TYPE29_CODE], 2)='10','Operating Income' , IIF(Left([SELN_TYPE29_CODE], 2)='20','Operating Expenses', IIF(Left([SELN_TYPE29_CODE], 2)='25', 'Net Contribution', IIF(Left([SELN_TYPE29_CODE],2)>'25', 'Non Operating Income & Expenses','' ))))</Expression> <ColumnToTotal></ColumnToTotal> <ColumnToRestartOnChange></ColumnToRestartOnChange> <DefaultValue></DefaultValue> <LookupName></LookupName> <LookupColumnName></LookupColumnName> </ColumnItemDef> <ColumnItemDef> <DefKey>af30f34a-2966-4d98-90cd-b00a9fe78c03</DefKey> <ColumnName>REPORT_SECTION</ColumnName> <ColumnType>INT</ColumnType> <ColumnAction Description="Calculate">CAL</ColumnAction> <Expression>IIF(Left([SELN_TYPE29_CODE], 2)='10', 1, IIF(Left([SELN_TYPE29_CODE], 2)='20', 2, IIF(Left([SELN_TYPE29_CODE], 2)='25', 3, IIF(Left([SELN_TYPE29_CODE],2)>'25', 4, 99))))</Expression> <ColumnToTotal></ColumnToTotal> <ColumnToRestartOnChange></ColumnToRestartOnChange> <DefaultValue></DefaultValue> <LookupName></LookupName> <LookupColumnName></LookupColumnName> </ColumnItemDef> <ColumnItemDef> <DefKey>db4d1c02-522c-4264-94b0-dab31ed4b6ea</DefKey> <ColumnName>RPTSUM_DESC</ColumnName> <ColumnType>STR</ColumnType> <ColumnAction Description="Lookup">LKP</ColumnAction> <Expression>Right([ACCNBRI], 4)</Expression> <ColumnToTotal></ColumnToTotal> <ColumnToRestartOnChange></ColumnToRestartOnChange> <DefaultValue>NA</DefaultValue> <LookupName>RPTSUM_DESC</LookupName> <LookupColumnName>FDESCR</LookupColumnName> </ColumnItemDef> <ColumnItemDef> <DefKey>0a1cd20d-2ef1-41a2-adbe-8d5cfae05130</DefKey> <ColumnName>RPTDET_DESC</ColumnName> <ColumnType></ColumnType> <ColumnAction Description="Lookup">LKP</ColumnAction> <Expression></Expression> <ColumnToTotal></ColumnToTotal> <ColumnToRestartOnChange></ColumnToRestartOnChange> <DefaultValue>NA</DefaultValue> <LookupName>RPTDET_DESC</LookupName> <LookupColumnName>FDESCR</LookupColumnName> </ColumnItemDef> </Columns> <Lookups> <LookupItemDef> <DefKey>49de3d30-d9e8-4015-a094-164857fe430d</DefKey> <LookupName>RPTSUM_DESC</LookupName> <LookupTableName>AFRG_SELN_RAW</LookupTableName> <Links> <LookupLinkItemDef> <DefKey>8a7fc883-c408-4409-ba42-d5969aabaa1e</DefKey> <LookupColumnName>SELN_CODE</LookupColumnName> <SourceColumnName>SELN_TYPE29_CODE</SourceColumnName> </LookupLinkItemDef> </Links> <DefKey>5871d400-eb3d-4e16-909a-1df67256086c</DefKey> <LookupColumnName>SELN_CODE</LookupColumnName> <SourceColumnName>SELN_TYPE28_CODE</SourceColumnName> </LookupLinkItemDef> </Links> </LookupItemDef> </Lookups> <AddKeyColumn>false</AddKeyColumn> <KeyColumnName>ChartTypeClassification</KeyColumnName> </StorageObject>
